name: Solares
description:
Story: 

You stumble upon an old computer from the 1980's at a garage sale. Wired to the computer is a helmet with a sensor. Thinking it would make a good selfie, you put the helmet on. Immediately your consciousness is transferred into the AI-controlled computer. You are presented with a simple puzzle. Easy enough to solve, just match the cubes to their corresponding color panel. As you progress, you notice the AI is learning and changing the simulation. The puzzles are getting harder and your only option to escape is to solve these puzzles. You don't know if you can defeat the AI and return to your body, or if the AI will defeat you and achieve singularity.

Game Information:

Test your puzzle solving skills in the grid-based city of Solares. Move boxes to their colored locations, use switches and devices with new mechanics to help you solve each puzzle.

Features:

- 60 levels

- Gamepad Controller Supported
